about_the_game: The Blaston Official Soundtrack is finally here! Featuring tunes from the Ozo Lounge, the single player campaign and the main theme from our launch trailer. Stream it on the platform of your choice, and enjoy the synths brought to life from our competitive VR shooter! The soundtrack is published by Resolution Games and made by Linus Söderlund & Magnus Walterstad.
detailed_description: The Blaston Official Soundtrack is finally here! Featuring tunes from the Ozo Lounge, the single player campaign and the main theme from our launch trailer. Stream it on the platform of your choice, and enjoy the synths brought to life from our competitive VR shooter! The soundtrack is published by Resolution Games and made by Linus Söderlund & Magnus Walterstad.
legal_notice: Copyrights and trademarks are property of Resolution Games.
name: Blaston Soundtrack Vol. 1
short_description: Blaston Soundtrack Vol1 is the first soundtrack for Blaston. It includes a collection of cyberpunk synth pop music composed for the game and it's trailers. Published by Resolution Games and made by Linus Söderlund & Magnus Walterstad.
